name: RBA Consulting
tagline: The whole is greater than the sum of its parts.
description:
Founded in 2006, RBA is an award-winning national digital and technology consultancy based in Minneapolis, Minnesota. Our team of strategists, designers and technologists have a proven track record of delivering successful solutions for organizations throughout the US.
Recently recognized as one of the nation’s fastest growing private companies and consistently named a Best Place to Work, RBA attracts the industry's top creative and technical talent to help our clients deliver on the promise of technology in today’s digital era.
READ MORE...
